name: Rhynamo
description:
**RHYNAMO HAS MOVED** visit https://provingground.io/tools/rhynamo/ to get the latest versions. 

Rhynamo is an open source Dynamo (2.0) node library  for reading and writing Rhino 3DM files. New support has been added for Rhino 5.0 and 6.0 files. Rhynamo uses McNeel's OpenNURBS library to expose new nodes for translating Rhino geometry for use within Dynamo. In addition, several experimental nodes are provided that allow for 'Live' access to the Rhino command line.  Rhynamo is an experimental tool provided under the MIT open source license.
